name: A and Y Geriatric Service INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: A and Y Geriatric Service INC is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Coral Gables, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $15.5M in Medicaid payments across 408K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $15.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
